Comments_List: Developed my musicianship skills (ear training, sight singing etc)
Sight reading, rhythm, metric space, harmonic and rhythmic dictation. Tonal and atonal harmony.
Strengths: Michael is an excellent instructor, very knowledgable and changed how I listened to music. Weaknesses: more work than I was expecting from a half credit course.

The course was heavier on theory than I expected... I thought this class would focus more on skill-building since there are companion intro music classes to this one that focus solely on theory (MUSI 210/211).

Overall, the course was good. However, at times, assignments felt too difficult for the level of the course and required much outside time and help. If more of the assigned creative/out-of-the-box questions that had less directly to do with the course were delegated to be extra credit, homeworks would have been more manageable.
Yes, it helps but you never know how it will turn out because it depends a whole lot on who the teacher happens to be
